Html:
Hello everybody,

I've been following the tutorial of SSAS 2005 (http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms170208.aspx) and in the lesson 4 I've been expected to find the correct project solution without any success, the Samples database downloaded from CodePlex doesn't have the required tutorial files. Am I blind or somebody forgot to update the samples/tutorial page???? How could I get that database or an updated tutorial of SSAS?

Thanks a lot!

Hey Chris,

Make sure you have the right samples.  Here is the link for ALL samples for SQL Server 2005, including SSAS 2005. 

LINK: http://www.codeplex.com/SqlServerSamples/Release/ProjectReleases.aspx?ReleaseId=4000

You can re-install, and it comes with completed lessons, so you woun't have to re-work through the previous lessons; that is, install the first 3 completed lessons, and pick up with Lesson #4.  This should get you back on track.

Hope this helps,

Mike
